name: Camp Stalker Semi-Auto Crampons - Unisex
description: Great for mountaineering and glacier crossings that don't involve technical climbing, the Stalker Crampon has an updated profile to fit modern mountaineering boots. Semi-automatic bindings offer a secure fit on most semi-rigid mountaineering boots with a heel welt.Made of durability chromoly steel.12 points design is great for general mountaineering.Semi-automatic bindings attach to most semi-rigid mountaineering boots.Dynamic anti-balling plates prevent snow and ice buildup.Flexible centre bar works with flexible footwear.Tool-free adjustment for easy sizing.Comes with carrying case for storage.
